messages.title: Newport Now
messages.content: Nick Webb has championed our Newport traders, fought against overdevelopment and backed small businesses.

messages.title: Welsh patients let down by Labour
messages.content: Welsh Labour must be held accountable for their failure to achieve their own NHS targets.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: I support a motorway-standard M4 Relief Road and improvements to rail and bus services.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Welsh Labour's political ideology ahead of patient care
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Welsh Labour has put political ideology ahead of patient care in running the Welsh NHS. I'll put patients first.
I will support high quality job creation in Newport and seek to establish a distinct identity, built upon our city's culture, heritage and innovation.

issues.governance: A better future for you and your family. Competent leadership or Coalition of chaos.
issues.health: Welsh Labour must be held accountable for their failure to achieve their own NHS targets.

leaflet.personalStatement: I want to create more opportunity, more jobs and to assist businesses so that they can thrive again in Britain.

politicalExperience.achievements: Nick has been listening to voters and discussing how we can make Newport an even better place to live.

endorsements.endorsement: The deficit down Competent leadership Jobs up More jobs by backing small businesses No income tax if you're on minimum wage.

Nick discussing Newport Market with traders
